name: Fresh Start (Azury)
description:
Controls

WD To move left and Right

Space to Jump

Left Click to Attack

Right-click to block

How it Works

When you play the game you will notice several items which can be picked up. These items will give you a significant advantage when attempting to complete the level. However, if you were to die, the picked-up items would be dropped in your last known location. So sometimes it might be best for you to simply save the best weapon till you are sure you can go ahead without dying because sometimes you will need to ;). This can be refreshed if you simply select Fresh Start on the death screen

Credits:

Music: FROZEN | Epic Majestic Orchestral Cover Collections By Frostudio Chambersonic
